name: Asteroid Miner (Kantano)
description:
You are a prospector in not so distant future! 

Your goal is to capture an asteroid by a grappling hook and bring it to your homebase. 

But beware both the mighty planets with their gravitational pull as well as your own springy grappling hook! 

Don't run out of fuel and don't get lost in space. 

Will you be the fastest prospector in the universe? Or will you die a horrible death? 

//////

- how to play demo: 

- The layout of planets changes in every game 

- your ship starts always at top left corner, asteroid is in bottom left and homebase in top right 

- beware the physics: gravity of planets and spring in grappling hook
